items.title: West Ham appoint Nuno after sacking Potter
items.summary: West Ham appoint former Nottingham Forest manager Nuno Espirito Santo as head coach after sacking Graham Potter.

items.title: â€˜Two Pianosâ€™ Review: A Virtuosoâ€™s Past Catches Up With Him at Dizzying Speed in Arnaud Desplechinâ€™s Frantic Melodrama
items.summary: Minutes into â€œTwo Pianos,â€ two former lovers unexpectedly run into each other in the narrow lobby of an venerable Lyon apartment building, after several years of estrangement. In the real world, this would be a cue for some halting, awkward small talk, perhaps, or a passive-aggressive nod of acknowâ€¦

items.title: Enthusiasts bond twelve 56K dial-up modems together to set dial-up broadband records â€” a dozen screeching boxes achieve record 668 kbps download speeds
items.summary: Can you stream YouTube via dial-up? You'll need at least four bonded 56K modems. But what if you have 12?

items.title: 'The changing of the guard?' - Sorensen-McGee scores her second against France
items.summary: Braxton Sorensen-McGee scores her second try of the game and her 11th of the tournament as New Zealand cruise to victory over France in the Rugby Union World Cup third place play-off, cheered on by team-mate Portia Woodman-Wickliffe.

items.title: The strangest game of the year is a channel-surfing simulator
items.summary: It's not quite October yet, and there are still plenty of video games set to be released before the end of the year. Even still, I'm pretty convinced that Blippo Plus will go down as the strangest release of 2025. Calling it a game might be a bit of a misnomer; it's more of an alien television simuâ€¦

items.title: Can Google be trusted without a break up?
items.summary: On day three of the two-week remedies trial in the Justice Department's ad tech case against Google, Judge Leonie Brinkema boiled down the argument to one key issue: trust. Brinkema interrupted testimony from a DOJ expert with a hypothetical: should she issue a strict order modifying Google's behavâ€¦

items.title: 'My goodness!' - McIlroy and Fleetwood on a charge
items.summary: Rory McIlroy sinks a 22 foot putt for birdie on hole five to put himself and Tommy Fleetwood two up against Harris English and Collin Morikawa in their Saturday morning foursomes.

items.title: Apple's iPhone 17 chip becomes the fastest single-core CPU in the world on PassMark, beating PC chips and Apple's own M3 Ultra â€” passively-cooled A19 CPU catapults past power-hungry competitors
items.summary: Apple's latest mobile chip, the A19, has officially become the world's fastest CPU, at least in PassMark's single-threaded benchmark. It outperformed every flagship desktop processor from both Intel and AMD, as well as Apple's own M3 Ultra, while requiring less cooling and consuming significantly lâ€¦

items.title: Large-scale simulated 10-year torture test confirms burn-in haunts all OLED monitors â€” Testing also reveals edge-lit TVs are insanely failure-prone
items.summary: RTINGS.com's longevity burn-in test for TVs and monitors enters its second year of progress, with many screens dying completely or showing intense signs of wear and tear after the equivalent of 10 years of average use.

items.title: Five Takeaways From Busanâ€™s Milestone 30th Edition
items.summary: The 30th Busan International Film Festival wrapped its 10-day run with record attendances, but beneath the star-studded red carpets and celebratory atmosphere, the landmark edition spotlighted an industry in transition. From the crisis facing Korean cinema to the festivalâ€™s competitive transformatiâ€¦

items.title: vivo and iQOO announce Android 16-based OriginOS 6 Preview Program
items.summary: vivo will introduce the Android 16-based OriginOS 6 on October 10 in China, with a global debut, including in India, set for October 15. That's exciting news, as OriginOS has been exclusive to China for years, while vivo and iQOO devices outside China run Funtouch OS. The upcoming vivo X300 series â€¦

items.title: Alcaraz hails 'best physio in world' after victory
items.summary: Carlos Alcaraz praises his physiotherapist after overcoming an ankle injury to reach the quarter-finals of the Japan Open.

items.title: 'Very streetwise' - Glasner's 17-game unbeaten run at Palace
items.summary: Football Focus pundits Ashley Williams and Martin Keown assess Crystal Palace's defence and 17-game unbeaten run under Oliver Glasner.

items.title: AMD's memory patent outlining a 'new, improved RAM' made from DDR5 memory isn't a new development â€” HB-DIMMs already superseded, probably won't come to market
items.summary: AMD's HB-DIMM concept probably isn't coming to market, as the company has already thrown its support behind the similar JEDEC MRDIMM standard.

items.title: Acer FA200 4TB SSD Review: A Capacious Retread
items.summary: The Acer FA200 has nothing wrong with it, having relatively good all-around performance and solid power efficiency. Itâ€™s outdated and hard to find, though.

items.title: When this EV maker collapsed, its customers became the car company
items.summary: Cristian Fleming paid around $70,000 for his dream car, a Fisker Ocean. He was drawn to the new EV's 350-mile range, eco-friendly image, and quirky features like "California Modes," which rolls down nearly every window at once. "I've always bought my cars because I love the way they look," Fleming â€¦

items.title: What to expect from Amazonâ€™s big fall hardware event on Tuesday
items.summary: Amazon is hosting its 2025 fall hardware event on Tuesday, September 30th, and it could be a packed show. The companyâ€™s invite has a few not-so-subtle hints about new Echos and a new Kindle. It will also be Amazonâ€™s next big product event for Panos Panay, who joined Amazon in 2023 to head up its deâ€¦

items.title: Two of the best 2TB SSDs for the ROG Xbox Ally and Steam Deck are at record low prices â€” surprise SSD price cuts come as shortages and price hikes loom due to the AI server boom
items.summary: We've found three noteworthy SSD deals, including two 2TB SSD models that are at their lowest recorded prices yet, designed to work in handheld PC's such as the Steam Deck and ROG Ally.
